description: The review will examine the government's handling of a long-running pay dispute with Manx teachers.
title: Manx teacher's pay dispute faces independent review
title_page: Manx teacher's pay dispute faces independent review - BBC News
maintext: Chief Minister Howard Quayle said he had "every confidence" in Mr Cregeen but that an independent body would be appointed to examine "governance arrangements" within the department and how it "interacts with the schools".
